sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, ListGroupItem, Form, } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { listProductsDetails } from '../actions/productActions' import Loader from './Loader' import Message from './Message' const ProductScreen = ({ match }) => { const [qty, setQty] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch() const productDetails = useSelector((state) => state.productDetails) const { loading, error, product } = productDetails useEffect(() => { dispatch(listProductsDetails(match.params.id)) }, [dispatch, match]) return (
Go Back {loading ? ( ) : error ? ( {error} ) : (

{product.name}

Price:â‚¬{product.price}

Description:- {product.description}

Status: {product.status} {product.status === 'Available' && ( Quantity: setQty(e.target.value)} > [0,1,2,3,4,5] )} )}
) } export default ProductScreen
